short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TimeOut is an extension by Casivo that promotes responsible gambling, letting users set timers for effective session management.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TimeOut help people gamble more responsibly. With a simple timer, players can control how long they gamble, promoting a healthy way of playing at online casinos.

* Prevents addiction by limiting gambling time
* Promotes healthier engagement with online gambling
* Enables users to set limits for better time management
* Helps users gamble more responsibly
